items.sentence: How many times have I told you not to bring people over without asking for my permission first?
Tom tried to keep himself busy, so he wouldn\'t think about the bad things that were happening.
I don\'t know if you\'ve noticed or not, but Tom hasn\'t been getting to work on time recently.
Tom did not want to throw anything away because he thought that he might need it in the future.
What matters in life is not where you are right now, but the direction in which you are headed.
No one would\'ve remembered Tom if he hadn\'t painted his name on the ceiling of the classroom.
If I learn to play the washboard and you learn to play the kazoo, maybe we can join a jug band.
Tom couldn\'t help thinking that he would\'ve passed the test if he\'d studied a little harder.
Access to information is now much easier than at any point in the past, thanks to the internet.
Tom says that he speaks fluent French. Let's talk to him in only French to test that claim out.
